name: Parachute (itch) (josefine77)
description:
controls:

right -> d or right arrow
left -> a or left arrow

You can control the little boat to catch all the parachuters before they fall into the ocean, which might contain sharks. If you do you will get a point and the game will get faster, yet if you don't you loose one life.

It is a remake of the 1981 "parachute" game.

This is my first game here, so I would like to get feedback! :)

Have fun!

(btw I just could not get the ui size right and do not know how to fix it)

the music is not by me, it is the music of the original game
